price: بې شکه ستا رب په خپل حكم سره د هغوى ترمنځ پرېكړه كوي او همغه ډېر پوه برلاسى دى.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥuk'mihi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
